fixes.name: Accounts Above Threshold
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF expression to DAX IF. Replaced [CurrentBalance] and [AccountID] with 'accounts+'[CurrentBalance] and 'accounts+'[AccountID]. Replaced the Tableau parameter [Parameters].[Balance Threshold] with SELECTEDVALUE('Balance Threshold'[Display As]) as required for parameters in DAX.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter ([Parameters].[Balance Threshold]); per the rules, any formula referencing parameters must be created as a measure.
